title: intrinsic gas too high
body:
### Version of Hardhat

2.14.0

### What happened?

this error will not always happen but it does happen randomly
```
An unexpected error occurred:

Error: missing revert data in call exception; Transaction reverted without a reason string [ See: https://links.ethers.org/v5-errors-CALL_EXCEPTION ] (data="0x", transaction={"from":"0x018281853eCC543Aa251732e8FDaa7323247eBeB","to":"0x2ec6e1E37831EBb0C8Cc54bb907FDA6e3c382f88","data":"0xec489c21000000000000000000000000c75dcf8855de359f1fa8c2c92ca001cfee952101","accessList":null}, error={"name":"ProviderError","_stack":"ProviderError: intrinsic gas too high\n    at HttpProvider.request (/home/cj/Projects/paraspace-core/node_modules/hardhat/src/internal/core/providers/http.ts:88:21)\n    at processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:95:5)\n    at async EthersProviderWrapper.send (/home/cj/Projects/paraspace-core/node_modules/@tenderly/hardhat-tenderly/node_modules/@nomiclabs/hardhat-ethers/src/internal/ethers-provider-wrapper.ts:13:20)","code":-32000,"_isProviderError":true}, code=CALL_EXCEPTION, version=providers/5.7.1)
    at Logger.makeError (/home/cj/Projects/paraspace-core/node_modules/@ethersproject/logger/src.ts/index.ts:269:28)
    at Logger.throwError (/home/cj/Projects/paraspace-core/node_modules/@ethersproject/logger/src.ts/index.ts:281:20)
    at checkError (/home/cj/Projects/paraspace-core/node_modules/@tenderly/hardhat-tenderly/node_modules/@ethersproject/providers/src.ts/json-rpc-provider.ts:66:16)
    at EthersProviderWrapper.<anonymous> (/home/cj/Projects/paraspace-core/node_modules/@tenderly/hardhat-tenderly/node_modules/@ethersproject/providers/src.ts/json-rpc-provider.ts:642:20)
    at step (/home/cj/Projects/paraspace-core/node_modules/@tenderly/hardhat-tenderly/node_modules/@ethersproject/providers/lib/json-rpc-provider.js:48:23)
    at Object.throw (/home/cj/Projects/paraspace-core/node_modules/@tenderly/hardhat-tenderly/node_modules/@ethersproject/providers/lib/json-rpc-provider.js:29:53)
    at rejected (/home/cj/Projects/paraspace-core/node_modules/@tenderly/hardhat-tenderly/node_modules/@ethersproject/providers/lib/json-rpc-provider.js:21:65)
    at processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:95:5) {
  reason: 'missing revert data in call exception; Transaction reverted without a reason string',
  code: 'CALL_EXCEPTION',
  data: '0x',
  transaction: {
    from: '0x018281853eCC543Aa251732e8FDaa7323247eBeB',
    to: '0x2ec6e1E37831EBb0C8Cc54bb907FDA6e3c382f88',
    data: '0xec489c21000000000000000000000000c75dcf8855de359f1fa8c2c92ca001cfee952101',
    accessList: null
  },
  error: ProviderError: intrinsic gas too high
      at HttpProvider.request (/home/cj/Projects/paraspace-core/node_modules/hardhat/src/internal/core/providers/http.ts:88:21)
      at processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:95:5)
      at async EthersProviderWrapper.send (/home/cj/Projects/paraspace-core/node_modules/@tenderly/hardhat-tenderly/node_modules/@nomiclabs/hardhat-ethers/src/internal/ethers-provider-wrapper.ts:13:20)
}
```

### Minimal reproduction steps

1. clone github.com/para-space/paraspace-core
2. create .env
```
NETWORK=localhost
ETHERSCAN_KEY=xxxx
ALCHEMY_KEY=xxxxx
ETHERSCAN_VERIFICATION=false
ETHERSCAN_VERIFICATION_CONTRACTS=*
MOCHA_JOBS=1
DB_PATH=deployed-contracts.json
DEPLOYER_MNEMONIC=xxxxx
FORK=mainnet
```
4. yarn
5. make build
6. make hardhat
7. make deploy

### Search terms

_No response_
